name: Cabin Chef Knife
lead: Cabin Chef Knife  design inspired by northern nature, powered by form and function
description: Cabin Chef Knife is a versatile general purpose knife. This knife is excellent for chopping and cutting vegetables and meat, as well as doing small chores at the campfire.

Marttiinis knife making tradition can be seen in the small detail of the blade: the slightly upturned tip of the spine. The purpose of the upturned tip was originally to make it easier to lift a hot pot on top of an open fire.
The Knife is part of the Cabin Chef set designed by Harri Koskinen.

The blade of the knife is made of high-quality, durable stainless steel. The handle is made of Finnish thermally modified birch  a material known for its durability and graceful aging as well as warm and pleasant feel grip. The matte finish ensures a safe grip even when wet.
The harmonious combination of beautiful design and practicality, as well as durable natural materials, guarantee that the Cabin Chef Knife is a pleasure to use, time and time again.
